synopsis.p: Short, 5 to 15 minute talks from a variety of people, on any subject as long as it's got at least a tangent to Perl.
The order of talks listed here does not imply any order of presentation.

description.p: Recently the Android Scripting Environment (ASE) was renamed Scripting Layer 4 Android. The second release (SL4A r1) was just posted a couple days ago which address several issues from my talk a couple months back - including packaging scripts for distribution on the Android Market and creating GUI's with a WebView.

talk.speaker: Scott Elcomb
talk.title: Pirate Party of Canada - One year on

description.p: Last year I described a bit about the Pirate Party of Canada and we had some short discussion on IP & Privacy matters. There's been a lot of activity in the last year and I'd be happy to talk a bit about what we've been up to.
